Title: Power Down
Plot: The team literally finds themselves in the dark when the investigation into the death of a lieutenant is connected to a city-wide blackout.
ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence and content that may disturb
Writer: Steven D. Binder, David J. North
GuestStars: Cara Buono, Corey Sorenson, Ryan Honey, Roderick McCarthy, Frank Caeti
